class pylossmap.lossmap.LossMap(data, background=None, datetime=None, context=None)[source]¶
property meta(self)[source]¶
set_background(self, LM_bg)[source]¶

Links the provided background LossMap to this one.

Parameters

LM_bg (LossMap) – Background LossMap

Raises

ValueError – If the provided background is not a LossMap instance.

Returns the linked background LossMap

Returns

the linked LossMap instance.

Return type

filter(self, reg)[source]¶

Applies a regexp filter to the BLM names a returns a filters LossMap instance.

Parameters

reg (str) – regexp string.

Returns

LossMap instance containing the BLMs which matched the regex string.

Return type

LossMap

Parameters

wrt (str, optional) – Either ‘max’ or a BLM name.

Returns

LossMap instance normalized.
